name: 18th Nanotechnology and Nanomedicine congress
content: Hello Dear Admin, Greetings. Hope you are doing well. I am the Conference service Manager of Nano tech - 2021 Congress the one which is going to be held at Osaka during July 26-27, 2021\. The aim behind my mailing is to reach at the specific person in the field of Nanotechnology and Nanomedicine. So that I can invite to attend the said conference. By joining this you are going to get an opportunity to meet Eminent people in the field of Nnaotechnology from 30 different countries. The two days conference includes Keynote presentation, Oral presentation, Poster session, Workshops, Symposium, Special session, Video presentation, Young researchers forum and many more. Kindly reply us back accordingly. Will be waiting for your response. W: https://nanomedicine.healthconferences.org/ Kind regards Olivia Caroline Conference Manager Nano Tech -2021 E: nanomedicine@theexpertsmeet.com whatsapp: +447426056247
